trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_SEQ_00<tab>Managingway would lend a hand─or perhaps an ear─to a sound endeavor.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_SEQ_01<tab>Speak with Keepingway.
TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_SEQ_02<tab>Deliver the requested item to Savingway in the Carrotorium.
TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_SEQ_03<tab>Report to Managingway.
TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Keepingway.

TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_TODO_01<tab><var 08 E4E8050A ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Savingway in the Carrotorium)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050B ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Savingway in the Carrotorium)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050C ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Savingway in the Carrotorium)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80509 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Savingway in the Carrotorium)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050D ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Savingway in the Carrotorium)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050E ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Savingway in the Carrotorium)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050F ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Savingway in the Carrotorium)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80510 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Savingway in the Carrotorium)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_TODO_02<tab>Report to Managingway.

TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_MANAGINGWAY_000_000<tab>Among the Ways, there is one whose task was to preserve information. His name is Savingway, and he has since awakened to the dream of recording our voices.
TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_MANAGINGWAY_000_001<tab>To that end, he is in the midst of developing a supporter with voice-recording functionality, and has requested some components for it.
TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_MANAGINGWAY_000_002<tab>If you're willing to craft these components, please seek out Keepingway yonder. He will provide you with guidance as well as the necessary materials.
TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_KEEPINGWAY_000_010<tab>Working on Savingway's request, are you? Then you've come to the right Way!
TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_KEEPINGWAY_000_011<tab>What he needs is a component for the circuit board. Here are the materials─if you require more, the doing supporter will assist you.
TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_KEEPINGWAY_000_012<tab>What he needs is a component for the organic conductor. Here are the materials─if you require more, the doing supporter will assist you.
TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_KEEPINGWAY_000_013<tab>What he needs is a component for the liquid semiconductor. Here are the materials─if you require more, the doing supporter will assist you.
TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_KEEPINGWAY_000_014<tab>Once the item is ready, hop-skip over with it to Savingway. You'll find him at work in the northwest of the Carrotorium.

TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_SUPPORTER04696_000_015<tab><blip> This supporter detects that you still have materials. Please use up your current allocation before requesting more, and remember: dreams are meaningless unless they are sustainable!

TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_SUPPORTER04696_000_016<tab><blip> This supporter detects that you still have materials. Please use up your current allocation before requesting more, and remember: dreams are meaningless unless they are sustainable!

TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_SUPPORTER04696_000_017<tab><blip> This supporter detects that you still have materials. Please use up your current allocation before requesting more, and remember: dreams are meaningless unless they are sustainable!
TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_SUPPORTER04696_000_018<tab><blip> This supporter detects that you have depleted your materials. Additional allocation approved.
TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_SUPPORTER04696_000_019<tab><blip> This supporter detects that you have depleted your materials. Additional allocation approved.
TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_SUPPORTER04696_000_020<tab><blip> This supporter detects that you have depleted your materials. Additional allocation approved.
TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_LOPORRIT04696_000_025<tab>Just that one component, and the supporter will be ready for a start-up test...
TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_LOPORRIT04696_000_026<tab>Ooh, this is precisely what I need! Thank you! I'll install it at once and commence testing!
TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_LOPORRIT04696_000_027<tab>Greetings, greetings. Hail fellow well met. This is Savingway, this is Savingway.
TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_LOPORRIT04696_000_028<tab>...That should do it. Now to see if it managed to record properly!
TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_SUPPORTER04696_000_028<tab>(-Savingway's Voice-)<buzz> Greetings, greetings. Hail fellow well met. <buzz> This is Savingway, this is Savingway.
TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_LOPORRIT04696_000_029<tab>Haha, great success! While there's some distortion, the quality is already quite serviceable, and we should be able to improve upon it!
TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_SUPPORTER04696_100_028<tab>(-Savingway's Voice-)<buzz> Greetings... Hail...well met... This...Saving... This is... <buzzzzzz>
TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_LOPORRIT04696_100_029<tab>Oh dear, that's no good at all... The audio is getting corrupted, perhaps in the course of encoding to data...
TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_SUPPORTER04696_200_028<tab>(-???-)<buzz> <squeal> <squeal> <squeal>!
TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_LOPORRIT04696_200_029<tab>Uwaaah! Wh-What in creation!?
TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_LOPORRIT04696_200_030<tab>I've never heard such a horrifying sound... Is it simply data corruption, or something else? I must look into it...

TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_LOPORRIT04696_000_030<tab>Well, though much remains to be done, we've confirmed the supporter's operation. I'll keep working on my dream─the dream that everyone will be able to listen to their favorite sounds, be it a loved one's voice or a song, no matter where they are. I hope that you'll lend me a hand again!

TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_LOPORRIT04696_000_031<tab>I'll keep working on my dream─the dream that everyone will be able to listen to their favorite sounds, be it a loved one's voice or a song, no matter where they are. I hope that you'll lend me a hand again!

TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_MANAGINGWAY_000_031<tab>Well now, not only did you craft and deliver the component, you also attended the start-up test? Savingway would have appreciated that, I'm sure. I thank you as well.

TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_MANAGINGWAY_000_032<tab>Be it the hum of activity as we work or songs we love, many are the sounds worth preserving. Through efficient and effective management, I shall do my part to help Savingway realize his dream!
TEXT_BANLOP110_04696_SYSTEM_000_040<tab>Normal-quality items crafted in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.
